alert.note: Alert for Coffee; Jeff Davis (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 12 at 5:46AM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Coffee and Jeff Davis Counties through 630 AM EST... At 546 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles east of Scotland to near Enigma. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Douglas, Hazlehurst, Broxton, Ambrose, Pridgen, West Green, Snipesville and Denton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 AM EST for southeastern Georgia. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 1100 AM EST for southeastern Georgia.
